text: ““Ndipo musachiyandikire chuma cha mwana wamasiye, koma m’njira yabwino (monga kuchichulukitsa ndi malonda) mpaka afike pansinkhu wokwanira. Ndipo kwaniritsani mwachilungamo miyeso ya mbale ndi masikelo; sitikakamiza munthu koma chimene angathe; ndipo pamene mukunena, (popereka umboni), nenani mwachilungamo ngakhale (umboniwo) uli wokhudza achibale. Ndipo kwaniritsani lonjezo la Allah. Izi ndi zomwe akukulangizani kuti mukumbukire.”
